main event: A glowing red object was observed moving in a zigzag course in Stockbridge, Massachusetts in 1962.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be 20-30 ft in diameter and was at a height of 1000-2000 ft., The object moved erratically at high speed for about 30 seconds before fading to a dim light., Witnesses were convinced it was an unconventional vehicle and not a meteor or flare., The observation was made under overcast weather conditions., There was no sound heard during the sighting.
witness description: A physician who does not appear given to flights of fancy.
